SexChocolate.title-1: How Many Boxes Would You Like?
SexChocolate.finest-ingredients-text: Made with premium ingredients in Germany.
SexChocolate.discreet-packaging-text: Delivered in unmarked packages for your privacy.
SexChocolate.delicious-flavor-text: Rich taste that enhances your experience.

BenefitsDrawerContent.ignite-passion-and-performance-text: Elevate your intimate moments with our exclusive blend of six clinically-studied natural ingredients. This potent formula boosts libido, enhances pleasure, increases energy, and uplifts mood to support a more satisfying and connected experience.
BenefitsDrawerContent.boost-libido-and-desire-text: Experience a heightened sense of desire with natural aphrodisiacs like Black Maca and Panax Ginseng. These ingredients have been traditionally used to stimulate sexual desire and improve performance, helping you rekindle passion and excitement in your relationship.
BenefitsDrawerContent.improve-blood-flow-and-sensation-text: Enhance your physical response with L-Arginine, an amino acid that supports healthy blood flow. By promoting better circulation, it can intensify sensations and contribute to more fulfilling intimate experiences.
BenefitsDrawerContent.increase-energy-and-stamina-text: Stay energized and combat fatigue with Guarana Extract and Taurine. These natural energizers help increase stamina and endurance, allowing you to enjoy longer-lasting moments without feeling drained.
BenefitsDrawerContent.enhance-mood-and-connection-text: Lift your spirits and deepen your emotional connection with Dark Chocolate, rich in mood-enhancing compounds like phenylethylamine, known as the "love chemical." This ingredient helps promote relaxation and a positive mood, setting the stage for intimacy.
BenefitsDrawerContent.support-hormonal-balance-text: Maintain a healthy hormonal balance with Black Maca, which supports overall sexual health for both men and women. By naturally balancing hormones, it aids in improving libido and sexual function.
BenefitsDrawerContent.promote-overall-well-being-text: Our holistic formula not only focuses on enhancing intimate moments but also contributes to your general wellness. The combination of natural ingredients works synergistically to support your vitality and well-being.

NutritionalDrawerContent.suggested-use-text: For a shared experience, divide one Cupid chocolate piece (half per person) and enjoy it together with your partner 30 minutes before your special moment.
NutritionalDrawerContent.suggested-use-text-2: Maximum recommended daily intake: 1/2 piece per person (approx. 15g)
NutritionalDrawerContent.ingredients-text: Cocoa mass, sugar, cocoa butter, popping candy, aphrodisiac blend (Schwarze Maca-Extrakt (20:1), L-Arginin, Guarana-Extrakt (6:1), Panax Ginseng-Extrakt (35:1), Taurin), contains caffeine from guarana, emulsifier: SOYA LECITHIN, vanilla extract, natural flavoring.
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-text: The use of this product is not suitable for children, pregnant women, nursing mothers, and people who have suffered a heart attack. The following individuals should consult their doctor or pharmacist before using this product:
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-item-3: People with kidney or liver diseases
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-text-2: Recommended daily dose of L-Arginine: max. 3.0g. OneÂ portion (15g) contains 0.44g of L-Arginine.
NutritionalDrawerContent.may-contain-traces: May contain traces of milk, hazelnuts, and almonds.
